message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $130.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand that $110 is a good price for you, but I'm still a bit above that. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $125.
I appreciate the compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I'm still a bit away from $115, but I'm willing to make another compromise. I can offer the product to you for $123.
I'm not sure I can go any higher than $112. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I'm still a bit away from $112, but I'm willing to make another compromise. I can offer the product to you for $119.
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $110. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still not willing to sell for $110. I can offer the product to you for $118.
This is my final offer. I'm willing to pay $108 for the product. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider buying from John for $150.
